HotspotConfig¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

Wifiservice

Description:

Represents the hotspot configuration.

A hotspot configuration must contain the SSID (or BSSID), security type, and key (if the security type is open).

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0

Summary¶

Description
